Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by Malibu in 1972...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/18/1983 to a 5-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Halifax on 10/22/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1985, hitting .481 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 34-game hitting streak snapped on 6/14/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1985, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
